OWASP BeNeLux Days Conference 2022

by OWASP Foundation

Become a sponsor of OWASP BeNeLux!

Sponsorship packages

There are 3 combined sponsorship packages (Gold, Silver or Bronze) that cover the BeNeLux chapter meetings 2022 and the BeNeLux OWASP Days 2022.

Download our sponsor brochure and contact us seba@owasp.org for questions or sponsorship confirmation!

Your sponsorship will be invested directly in the chapter meetings, supporting speaker and catering expenses.

The sponsorship will also be dedicated to cover the costs of the OWASP BeNeLux 2022 event.
